thread.title: KSDK making changes with weekend anchors posts
thread.title_full: KSDK making changes with weekend anchors posts

author: Joe Holleman St. Louis Post-Dispatch
title: KSDK making changes with weekend anchors posts
text:
Get your daily dose of local news right here. Close 
KSDK anchors Christina Coleman and Casey Nolen KSDK making changes with weekend anchors posts 
KSDK anchors Christina Coleman and Casey Nolen KSDK (Channel 5) 
Ch-ch-changes are in store for weekend newscasts at KSDK (Channel 5). 
Starting Saturday, Casey Nolen and Christina Coleman will take over anchoring duties for the 5, 6 and 10 p.m. newscasts. Then on Sunday, Jennifer Meckles will join Mike Bush in the anchor chairs for the 5 p.m. newscast. 
Nolen has been at the station since 2007; Coleman and Meckles arrived in 2014. 
Kelly Jackson , who had been handling all of the Saturday newscasts, still will anchor on Saturday and Sunday mornings.
